name: orthotics

the use of devices such as braces and splints to support weak or damaged bones, joints, muscles, etc.: Orthotics is regarded as an exclusive field within medicine. It is one of the leading companies in orthotics - the provision of specialist footwear and other devices, such as braces and callipers.
